tasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project with TypeScript
tasks.description: Set up the initial Next.js project with TypeScript for the Agentic CRM.
tasks.details: Use Next.js 14+ to create a new project. Enable TypeScript support by creating a tsconfig.json file. Install necessary dependencies including TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui for styling. Configure the project to use React Server Components and Zustand for state management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the project builds successfully and the development server runs without errors. Check that TypeScript is correctly configured by creating a sample component with type annotations.

tasks.title: Set Up Supabase Project
tasks.description: Create a Supabase project for database and authentication needs.
tasks.details: Sign up for Supabase and create a new project. Set up PostgreSQL database and configure authentication using Supabase Auth. Define initial database schema based on the PRD's data model, including tables for leads, companies, activities, workflows, and agents.
tasks.testStrategy: Test database connectivity and ensure that tables are created successfully. Verify authentication by creating a test user and logging in.

tasks.title: Create Database Schema and Migrations
tasks.description: Define and implement the database schema for the CRM system.
tasks.details: Use Supabase's SQL editor to define tables and relationships as per the PRD's data model. Create migrations to manage schema changes over time. Ensure tables include leads, companies, activities, workflows, workflow_runs, agents, agent_runs, templates, campaigns, and integrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Run migrations and verify that the schema is correctly applied. Check that all tables and relationships are correctly established in the database.

tasks.title: Install LangGraph and OpenAI SDK
tasks.description: Integrate LangGraph and OpenAI SDK for AI agent functionalities.
tasks.details: Install LangGraph and OpenAI SDK using npm. Configure LangGraph for workflow orchestration and OpenAI for AI capabilities. Set up API keys and environment variables securely for accessing OpenAI services.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify installation by running a sample LangGraph workflow and making a test call to OpenAI's API. Ensure that API keys are not exposed in the codebase.

tasks.title: Build Basic UI Components
tasks.description: Develop the initial UI components for the dashboard, leads list, and lead detail views.
tasks.details: Use Next.js and TailwindCSS to create responsive UI components. Implement pages for the dashboard, leads list with filters, and lead detail view with tabs for overview, research, timeline, conversations, and tasks. Ensure accessibility and usability standards are met.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform UI testing to ensure components render correctly across different devices and screen sizes. Use tools like Storybook for component testing and visual regression testing.

tasks.title: Implement Lead Enrichment Agent
tasks.description: Develop the first AI agent for lead enrichment using basic web search capabilities.
tasks.details: Create a Lead Enrichment Agent using LangGraph and OpenAI. Implement basic web search functionality to gather additional data about leads. Use OpenAI for generating insights and summaries.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the agent by running enrichment tasks on sample leads. Validate the accuracy and relevance of the enriched data and insights generated.

subtasks.title: Design Lead Enrichment Agent Architecture
subtasks.description: Create a detailed design for the Lead Enrichment Agent, outlining its architecture and components.
subtasks.details: Develop a comprehensive design document that includes the architecture of the Lead Enrichment Agent, specifying how it will interact with LangGraph and OpenAI. Define the data flow and processing steps for lead enrichment.

subtasks.title: Implement Basic Web Search Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the web search capabilities for the Lead Enrichment Agent to gather additional data about leads.
subtasks.details: Use available web search APIs or libraries to implement a module that can perform basic web searches. Ensure the module can extract relevant data points needed for lead enrichment.

subtasks.title: Integrate OpenAI for Insights and Summaries
subtasks.description: Incorporate OpenAI's capabilities to generate insights and summaries from the gathered data.
subtasks.details: Set up integration with OpenAI's API to process the data collected from web searches. Implement functionality to generate insights and summaries that enhance the lead enrichment process.

subtasks.title: Develop Data Processing and Enrichment Logic
subtasks.description: Create the logic for processing and enriching lead data using the gathered information and OpenAI insights.
subtasks.details: Implement the core logic that combines web search data and OpenAI-generated insights to enrich lead profiles. Ensure the logic is efficient and scalable.

subtasks.title: Test Lead Enrichment Agent Functionality
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of the Lead Enrichment Agent to ensure it functions correctly and meets requirements.
subtasks.details: Design and execute test cases to validate the accuracy and relevance of the enriched data. Use sample leads to test the agent's performance and identify any issues.

subtasks.title: Optimize and Document Lead Enrichment Agent
subtasks.description: Optimize the agent's performance and create comprehensive documentation.
subtasks.details: Review the agent's performance and make necessary optimizations for efficiency. Document the design, implementation, and usage of the Lead Enrichment Agent for future reference.

tasks.title: Set Up Firecrawl Account and Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Firecrawl for web scraping capabilities in lead generation.
tasks.details: Create a Firecrawl account and set up API access. Implement integration with the CRM system to allow web scraping of potential leads from various sources. Ensure compliance with web scraping policies.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the integration by scraping a sample website and verifying that the data is correctly imported into the CRM system.

subtasks.title: Create Firecrawl Account
subtasks.description: Sign up for a new Firecrawl account to enable web scraping capabilities.
subtasks.details: Visit the Firecrawl website and complete the registration process to create a new account.

subtasks.title: Set Up API Access
subtasks.description: Configure API access for the Firecrawl account to enable integration.
subtasks.details: Log into the Firecrawl account and navigate to the API settings to generate API keys and configure access permissions.

subtasks.title: Integrate Firecrawl with CRM
subtasks.description: Implement the integration of Firecrawl with the CRM system for web scraping.
subtasks.details: Use the Firecrawl API to connect with the CRM system, allowing for the scraping and importing of lead data.

subtasks.title: Test Compliance and Integration
subtasks.description: Ensure the integration complies with web scraping policies and functions correctly.
subtasks.details: Test the integration by scraping a sample website, verifying data import into the CRM, and ensuring compliance with relevant policies.

tasks.title: Create Simple LangGraph Workflow
tasks.description: Develop a basic LangGraph workflow for lead processing.
tasks.details: Define a simple workflow using LangGraph that includes steps for lead discovery, enrichment, scoring, and status update. Ensure the workflow is modular and can be extended with additional agents and steps.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute the workflow with test data and verify each step's output. Check for correct state transitions and data handling throughout the workflow.

subtasks.title: Define Workflow Steps
subtasks.description: Outline the steps for lead discovery, enrichment, scoring, and status update in the LangGraph workflow.
subtasks.details:
Create a detailed plan for each step in the workflow, ensuring clarity in the sequence and purpose of each step.
<info added on 2025-10-01T00:00:24.708Z>
Completed workflow step definitions:
- Discovery: Fetch and validate lead data
- Enrichment: AI web research using Tavily + OpenAI
- Scoring: AI-powered 0-100 quality score calculation
- Status Update: Automatic status assignment based on score (80+=qualified, 60+=researching, 40+=nurturing, <40=new)

All steps implement error handling, state tracking, and timing metrics.
</info added on 2025-10-01T00:00:24.708Z>

subtasks.title: Implement Lead Discovery Step
subtasks.description: Develop the lead discovery step in the LangGraph workflow.
subtasks.details: Use LangGraph to implement the lead discovery step, ensuring it can identify and capture potential leads effectively.

subtasks.title: Implement Enrichment and Scoring Steps
subtasks.description: Develop the enrichment and scoring steps in the LangGraph workflow.
subtasks.details: Ensure that the enrichment step adds relevant data to leads and the scoring step evaluates lead quality.

subtasks.title: Implement Status Update Step
subtasks.description: Develop the status update step in the LangGraph workflow.
subtasks.details: Create a mechanism to update the status of leads based on their score and enrichment data.

subtasks.title: Test and Ensure Modularity
subtasks.description: Test the entire workflow and ensure it is modular and extendable.
subtasks.details: Execute the workflow with test data, verify each step's output, and ensure the workflow can be easily extended with additional steps.

tasks.title: Build Agent Monitoring Dashboard
tasks.description: Create a dashboard to monitor the activity and performance of AI agents.
tasks.details: Develop a real-time monitoring dashboard using Next.js and React Query. Display active agents, logs, outputs, and performance metrics. Include controls to pause, resume, or terminate agents.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the dashboard by simulating agent activities and verifying that the data is accurately reflected in real-time. Ensure user interactions with the dashboard are responsive and intuitive.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard UI
subtasks.description: Create the user interface for the agent monitoring dashboard.
subtasks.details: Design the layout and components for displaying active agents, logs, outputs, and performance metrics using Next.js and React.

subtasks.title: Implement Real-Time Data Fetching
subtasks.description: Set up real-time data fetching for the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Use React Query to fetch and update data in real-time, ensuring the dashboard reflects current agent activity and performance.

subtasks.title: Integrate Agent Controls
subtasks.description: Add controls to manage agent activities from the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Implement controls to pause, resume, or terminate agents directly from the dashboard interface.

subtasks.title: Develop Performance Metrics Display
subtasks.description: Create components to display performance metrics of AI agents.
subtasks.details: Design and implement components that show detailed performance metrics such as response time, error rates, and throughput.

subtasks.title: Test Dashboard Functionality
subtasks.description: Test the dashboard for real-time updates and user interactions.
subtasks.details: Simulate agent activities and verify that the dashboard updates accurately in real-time. Ensure all user interactions are responsive and intuitive.

subtasks.title: Optimize Dashboard Performance
subtasks.description: Enhance the performance of the dashboard for better user experience.
subtasks.details: Identify and resolve any performance bottlenecks in the dashboard, ensuring smooth and fast operation under various loads.

tasks.title: Prepare Demo Data and Scenarios
tasks.description: Set up demo data and scenarios for showcasing the CRM's capabilities.
tasks.details: Create realistic demo data for leads, companies, and workflows. Develop scenarios that highlight key features such as autonomous lead discovery, intelligent outreach, and multi-agent workflows. Ensure scenarios are comprehensive and demonstrate the CRM's value proposition.
tasks.testStrategy: Run through each demo scenario to ensure they execute smoothly without errors. Validate that the scenarios effectively showcase the CRM's features and benefits.

subtasks.title: Create Demo Data
subtasks.description: Generate realistic demo data for leads, companies, and workflows.
subtasks.details: Develop a dataset that includes various leads, companies, and workflow examples to be used in demo scenarios. Ensure the data is diverse and covers different use cases.

subtasks.title: Develop Demo Scenarios
subtasks.description: Create scenarios that highlight key CRM features.
subtasks.details: Design scenarios that demonstrate autonomous lead discovery, intelligent outreach, and multi-agent workflows. Ensure each scenario effectively showcases the CRM's capabilities.

subtasks.title: Test Demo Scenarios
subtasks.description: Run through each demo scenario to ensure smooth execution.
subtasks.details: Execute each scenario to verify they run without errors and effectively demonstrate the CRM's features. Make adjustments as needed to enhance clarity and impact.

tasks.title: Build Chat UI Infrastructure
tasks.description: Develop the foundational chat interface using assistant-ui components, focusing on agent management capabilities.
tasks.details: To build the Chat UI Infrastructure, focus on creating a streamlined interface for managing agents. Use assistant-ui components to ensure consistency with the existing UI framework. Implement a message display that shows both user and assistant messages, supporting markdown and code block formatting. Include an input field with a send button for user interaction. Ensure the chat interface supports streaming responses from the assistant, displaying messages as they are received. Implement loading states to indicate when messages are being processed and error handling to manage any issues that arise during message transmission. Integrate this chat interface with the existing MyAssistant component to ensure seamless functionality within the application.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the message display by sending and receiving messages, ensuring correct formatting for markdown and code blocks. Check the input field and send button for responsiveness and correct message transmission. Simulate streaming responses to ensure messages appear in real-time. Test loading states by simulating delays in message processing and verify error handling by introducing errors in message transmission. Ensure the chat interface integrates smoothly with the MyAssistant component by testing end-to-end message flows.

subtasks.title: Implement Message History Display
subtasks.description: Develop the message display to show both user and assistant messages with markdown and code block formatting.
subtasks.details: Use ThreadPrimitive.Messages and ThreadPrimitive.Viewport for displaying messages. Ensure proper thread state management.

subtasks.title: Develop Input Field with Send Button
subtasks.description: Create an input field with a send button for user interaction.
subtasks.details: Ensure the input field is responsive and correctly transmits messages when the send button is clicked.

subtasks.title: Integrate Streaming Responses
subtasks.description: Ensure the chat interface supports streaming responses from the assistant, displaying messages as they are received.
subtasks.details: Implement real-time message updates to enhance user experience.

subtasks.title: Implement Loading States
subtasks.description: Develop loading states to indicate when messages are being processed.
subtasks.details: Provide visual feedback to users while messages are being processed.

subtasks.title: Design Error Handling Strategies
subtasks.description: Implement error handling to manage issues during message transmission.
subtasks.details: Ensure robust error handling to maintain application stability and provide user feedback.

subtasks.title: Integrate Chat Interface with MyAssistant Component
subtasks.description: Integrate the developed chat interface with the existing MyAssistant component for seamless functionality.
subtasks.details: Ensure the chat interface works smoothly within the application and leverages existing MyAssistant functionalities.

subtasks.title: Connect CRM Assistant Graph with Tools
subtasks.description: Deploy or configure the LangGraph CRM assistant graph with all tools (search leads, get lead status, process leads, get workflow status, list agents, get CRM stats) and connect it to the frontend chat UI.
subtasks.details:
The CRM assistant graph has been created with 6 tools in `frontend/lib/agents/crm-assistant-graph.ts`. Two deployment options are available:

1. **LangGraph Cloud** (Production): Deploy using `langgraph deploy` and configure environment variables (LANGGRAPH_API_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_LANGGRAPH_ASSISTANT_ID)

2. **Local Development**: Use the local API endpoint at `/api/agent` (already created)

Current state:
- ✅ Graph created with all tools
- ✅ Local API endpoint created
- ✅ Documentation created (docs/AGENT_CHAT_SETUP.md)
- ⏱️ Need to deploy/configure and test
- ⏱️ Need to verify tool calls work correctly
- ⏱️ May need to update chatApi.ts for local development

See docs/AGENT_CHAT_SETUP.md for detailed setup instructions.
<info added on 2025-10-14T23:24:15.393Z>
**FIXED**: Updated chatApi.ts and /api/agent endpoint to use local development instead of LangGraph Cloud.

**What was changed:**
1. Modified `frontend/lib/chatApi.ts` to remove LangGraph SDK dependency and call local endpoint directly
2. Updated `frontend/app/api/agent/route.ts` to properly format SSE responses for assistant-ui
3. Created troubleshooting guide at `docs/LOCAL_AGENT_SETUP.md`

**Issue found:** User was getting 500 errors because environment variables weren't set up yet.

**Solution:** User needs to create `frontend/.env.local` with:
- OPENAI_API_KEY (required for AI agent)
- NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL
- NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY  
- SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
- TAVILY_API_KEY (optional)

**Next step:** Once user adds env vars and restarts dev server, the chat will work locally at /agents page. All 6 tools (search_leads, get_lead_status, process_lead, get_workflow_status, list_agents, get_crm_stats) are ready to use via natural language.

See `docs/LOCAL_AGENT_SETUP.md` for complete setup instructions.
</info added on 2025-10-14T23:24:15.393Z>

tasks.title: Implement Natural Language CRM Queries
tasks.description: Enable the chat assistant to handle natural language database queries by converting them into Supabase queries and displaying results.
tasks.details: To implement natural language CRM queries, first integrate a natural language processing (NLP) library such as OpenAI's GPT or a similar model to parse user queries. Develop a parser that can interpret queries like "Show me all tech leads from Bay Area with >50 employees" and convert them into SQL queries compatible with Supabase. Ensure the parser supports filtering by industry, location, company size, status, and lead score. Implement a mechanism to display results in formatted tables or cards within the chat interface, utilizing the chat UI infrastructure. Handle pagination for large result sets by implementing a strategy to fetch and display data in chunks. Additionally, support follow-up refinement queries by maintaining context of the previous queries and results. Ensure the system is scalable and can handle multiple concurrent queries efficiently.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the implementation by inputting various natural language queries and verifying that they are correctly parsed into SQL queries. Check that the results are accurately retrieved from the database and displayed in the chat interface. Validate the formatting of results in tables or cards, and ensure pagination works smoothly for large datasets. Test follow-up queries to confirm that the system maintains context and refines results as expected. Perform load testing to ensure the system can handle multiple queries simultaneously without performance degradation.

subtasks.title: Integrate NLP Library
subtasks.description: Integrate a natural language processing library such as OpenAI's GPT to parse user queries.
subtasks.details: Select and integrate an NLP library capable of understanding and parsing natural language queries.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the integration by inputting sample queries and verifying that they are correctly parsed into structured data.

subtasks.title: Develop Query Parser
subtasks.description: Develop a parser to convert natural language queries into SQL queries compatible with Supabase.
subtasks.details: Create a parser that interprets user queries and translates them into SQL queries, supporting filters like industry, location, and company size.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the parser by inputting various queries and verifying the accuracy of the generated SQL queries.

subtasks.title: Implement Result Display Mechanism
subtasks.description: Implement a mechanism to display query results in formatted tables or cards within the chat interface.
subtasks.details: Utilize the chat UI infrastructure to format and display results, ensuring clarity and usability.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that results are displayed correctly in the chat interface, checking for formatting and usability.

subtasks.title: Handle Pagination for Large Result Sets
subtasks.description: Implement a strategy to fetch and display data in chunks for large result sets.
subtasks.details: Develop a pagination mechanism to efficiently handle and display large sets of data in the chat interface.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the pagination by querying large datasets and ensuring data is fetched and displayed in manageable chunks.

subtasks.title: Support Follow-up Refinement Queries
subtasks.description: Enable the system to maintain context for follow-up queries and refine results based on previous interactions.
subtasks.details: Implement context management to track previous queries and results, allowing users to refine their searches.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the context management by conducting follow-up queries and verifying that the system maintains context accurately.

tasks.title: Implement Lead and Company Lookup via Chat
tasks.description: Enable users to perform quick lookups of leads and companies through chat queries, providing detailed information and actions.
tasks.details: To implement the Lead and Company Lookup feature, integrate with the existing chat interface to handle specific query patterns such as 'Tell me about [Company]' or 'What's the status of [Lead Email]'. Utilize the natural language processing capabilities developed in Task 12 to parse these queries and convert them into database queries. Fetch relevant data from the CRM database, including company details, lead information, recent activities, and related records. Format the response to highlight key information and include interactive elements such as quick action buttons for 'Enrich', 'Update Status', and 'View Full Profile'. Ensure the system can display related records, such as other leads at the same company or similar companies, to provide comprehensive insights. Consider using a combination of Supabase queries and in-memory data processing to efficiently gather and present the required information.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the feature by inputting various lookup queries in the chat interface and verifying that the correct information is retrieved and displayed. Check that the responses are formatted correctly with key information highlighted and that quick action buttons function as expected. Validate that related records are accurately identified and presented. Conduct user testing to ensure the feature is intuitive and meets user needs.

subtasks.title: Integrate Chat Interface for Query Handling
subtasks.description: Integrate the existing chat interface to handle specific query patterns for lead and company lookups.
subtasks.details: Modify the chat interface to recognize and process queries like 'Tell me about [Company]' or 'What's the status of [Lead Email]'. Ensure the interface can pass these queries to the NLP system.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by inputting various query patterns in the chat interface and verify that they are correctly identified and processed.

subtasks.title: Utilize NLP for Query Parsing
subtasks.description: Use NLP capabilities to parse chat queries and convert them into database queries.
subtasks.details: Leverage the NLP system developed in Task 12 to interpret user queries and translate them into structured database queries for lead and company information retrieval.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the NLP parsing by checking the accuracy of database queries generated from a variety of chat inputs.

subtasks.title: Fetch Data from CRM Database
subtasks.description: Retrieve relevant data from the CRM database based on parsed queries.
subtasks.details: Implement database queries to fetch company details, lead information, recent activities, and related records from the CRM system.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the correct data is retrieved from the CRM database for a range of test queries.

subtasks.title: Format and Display Response
subtasks.description: Format the response to highlight key information and include interactive elements.
subtasks.details: Design the response format to emphasize important data and integrate quick action buttons like 'Enrich', 'Update Status', and 'View Full Profile'.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that responses are correctly formatted and interactive elements function as expected in the chat interface.

subtasks.title: Implement Related Records Display
subtasks.description: Ensure the system can display related records for comprehensive insights.
subtasks.details: Develop functionality to show related leads at the same company or similar companies, using a combination of Supabase queries and in-memory data processing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the display of related records by verifying that relevant connections are shown for various lead and company queries.

tasks.title: Implement CRUD Operations via Chat
tasks.description: Enable users to perform CRUD operations on CRM records through natural language commands in the chat interface.
tasks.details: To implement CRUD operations via chat, integrate natural language processing (NLP) capabilities to interpret user commands such as creating, updating, and modifying records. Use a library like OpenAI's GPT to parse commands and convert them into appropriate database operations using Supabase. Implement specific handlers for each type of operation: creation, updates, and deletions. Ensure that confirmation prompts are shown for destructive actions like deletions, and provide success feedback with links to updated records. For bulk operations, ensure the system can handle multiple records efficiently. Integrate these functionalities into the existing chat UI developed in Task 11, leveraging the natural language parsing capabilities from Task 12.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the CRUD operations by inputting various natural language commands in the chat interface. Verify that each command is correctly parsed and executed, resulting in the appropriate database changes. Check that confirmation prompts appear for destructive actions and that success messages include links to the updated records. Test bulk operations to ensure they are processed correctly and efficiently. Validate that the chat interface remains responsive and that feedback is clear and informative.

subtasks.title: Integrate NLP for Command Parsing
subtasks.description: Integrate natural language processing capabilities to interpret user commands for CRUD operations.
subtasks.details: Use OpenAI's GPT to parse natural language commands and convert them into structured database operations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by inputting various CRUD commands and verifying correct parsing into database operations.

subtasks.title: Develop Handlers for CRUD Operations
subtasks.description: Implement specific handlers for creating, updating, and deleting CRM records based on parsed commands.
subtasks.details: Create handlers that execute database operations using Supabase for each CRUD action.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that each handler correctly executes the intended database operation for various command inputs.

subtasks.title: Implement Confirmation Prompts
subtasks.description: Ensure confirmation prompts are shown for destructive actions like deletions.
subtasks.details: Develop a system to prompt users for confirmation before executing delete operations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by attempting deletions and verifying that confirmation prompts appear before action execution.

subtasks.title: Provide Success Feedback
subtasks.description: Provide users with success feedback and links to updated records after operations.
subtasks.details: Implement feedback messages that confirm successful operations and include links to affected records.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that success messages are displayed with correct links after each CRUD operation.

subtasks.title: Optimize for Bulk Operations
subtasks.description: Ensure the system can handle bulk operations efficiently.
subtasks.details: Enhance the system to process multiple records in a single command efficiently.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by executing bulk operations and verifying system performance and accuracy.

tasks.title: Implement Agent Control via Chat
tasks.description: Enable users to trigger and control AI agents through chat commands, providing real-time updates and management capabilities.
tasks.details: To implement agent control via chat, integrate natural language processing (NLP) capabilities to interpret specific commands such as 'Enrich all pending leads', 'Run enrichment on Acme Corp', and 'Process these 5 leads through qualification workflow'. Use OpenAI's GPT for command parsing and LangGraph for agent orchestration. Develop a chat interface that displays real-time progress updates, agent status, and current tasks using the chat UI infrastructure. Implement functionality to cancel running agents and show a results summary upon completion. Ensure seamless integration with existing chat features and workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the agent control feature by inputting various chat commands and verifying that agents are triggered correctly. Check real-time progress updates and agent status displays in the chat interface. Test the cancel functionality to ensure agents can be stopped as expected. Validate that a results summary is shown upon task completion, and ensure all interactions are logged correctly.

subtasks.title: Integrate NLP for Command Parsing
subtasks.description: Develop and integrate natural language processing capabilities to interpret specific chat commands.
subtasks.details: Use OpenAI's GPT to parse commands such as 'Enrich all pending leads' and 'Run enrichment on Acme Corp'.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the NLP integration by inputting various commands and verifying correct interpretation and parsing.

subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the chat interface correctly displays real-time updates and statuses for various agent tasks.
